Pre-Game Insights: The 1st T20I of the England in Pakistan, 7 T20I Series, 2022 has Pakistan taking on England at the National Stadium, Karachi on 20th September 2022 at 08:00 PM IST.
In their last 5 games, England have won 2 games and lost 3. In their last 5 games, Pakistan have won 3 games and lost 2.

The pitch at the National Stadium, Karachi will allow for good stroke play and the batters will find it easy to bat on the surface. It will not allow a lot of assistance to the bowlers and wicket taking is going to be difficult.
The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 176 runs. The team batting first at this venue has won 55% of its matches, so the toss does not make much of a difference here.
Temperature will hover around 27.29 °C and humidity is expected to be around 73%. Winds at a speed of 5.63 m/s are expected.
Pacers have been very successful at this venue. They have taken 70% of the total wickets at this venue. Fantasy gully experts predict that the pitch will continue to assist the pacers.
In the 21 matches played between these 2 teams, England Bowlers have earned the most fantasy points for their team, while All Rounders have earned the most fantasy points for Pakistan.
